Mr. SMUCKER. Mr. Speaker, I am pleased to congratulate Adam Kingston  of Manheim Township on winning a gold medal in the Class 3A 3,200-meter  run at the PIAA track and field championship on May 24.

The 2025 PIAA Class 3A track and field championship…

…Mr. Speaker, I am pleased to congratulate and recognize  Root's Country Market on their 100th anniversary.

Root's Country Market is a farmer's market and auction based in  Manheim, Pennsylvania. The market's history stretches back to 1925 when  it was founded by A.W. Root as a poultry auction.

Since then, Root's has expanded to include homegrown produce,…
